name: UCLANewsroom
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
UCLA Newsroom provides UCLA students, faculty, staff, visitors and fans members insightful information about the campus and upcoming events.

To get started, enable the UCLA News skill, and ask “Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?” or "Alexa, what's in the news?" 

To hear UCLA news first, go to “Settings > Flash Briefing” in the Alexa app. Tap “Edit Order” and drag UCLA Newsroom to the top of the list.

To customize the content of UCLA Newsroom, go to “Settings > Flash Briefing > UCLA Newsroom” then toggle on and off the various news feeds.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
